sentences.en: A self aligned constricted mesa ( SACM ) high speed 1.55μ m MQW DFB laser is developed.
sentences.cn: 采用一种自对准压缩台面结构制作高速1.55μmDFB激光器.

sentences.en: Arterioles may be tightly constricted , as they usually are in shock, attempting to preserve arterial pressure.
sentences.cn: 小动脉可以紧紧收缩,这种情况常见于休克, 是为了保证动脉血压.

sentences.en: Cor. 6:12 You are not constricted in us, but you are constricted in your inward parts.
sentences.cn: 林后 六 12在我们里面,你们并不受限制, 你们乃是限制在自己的心肠里.

sentences.en: Her throat constricted and she swallowed hard.
sentences.cn: 她喉咙发紧，使劲地咽了一下唾沫。

sentences.en: Her throat felt dry and constricted.
His throat began to feel swollen and constricted.
sentences.cn: 他开始觉得喉咙肿胀发紧。

sentences.en: His throat was too constricted with jealousy.
sentences.cn: 喉咙为妒嫉所扼,唱不出什么歌.

sentences.en: Many of the women I spoke to left because they felt constricted.
sentences.cn: 和我聊过的很多女性因为觉得受拘束离开了。

sentences.en: Men and women alike have been constricted by traditional sexual roles.
sentences.cn: 男性和女性同样受到传统性别角色的束缚。

sentences.en: Pain constricted her heart and whitened her lips.
sentences.cn: 痛苦折磨着她的心,她的嘴唇也变得苍白了.

sentences.en: Reading how our symphony caused you sleepless nights, I felt my heart constricted.
sentences.cn: 你信中说,我们的交响曲使你连夜不能入眠, 我听了不由心痛如绞.

sentences.en: The duplicates are attached to each other at a constricted region called the centromere.
sentences.cn: 对偶体彼此相连于称为着丝粒的缩小的区域.

sentences.en: The rounds are definitely not particularly constricted except in the case of extremely narrow ore veins.
sentences.cn: 除了矿脉很狭窄,否则炮眼组肯定是不大受夹制的.

sentences.en: The tight collar constricted his neck.

sentences.cn: 温斯顿的心不由得一紧.

words.tran_cn: [微][植][昆]收缩的；狭隘的；受限制的
使…收缩；抑制（constrict的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 狭窄的； 收缩的； 抑制的， 约束的
压缩，压紧，使收缩( constrict的过去式和过去分词)
